description: Returns a filtered list of astronauts based on female or male astronauts.
Returns a filtered list of astronauts based on their astronaut group.
Returns a filtered list of astronauts based on the number of space flights they have been on.
Returns a filtered list of astronauts based on the number of hours during space flight they have been on.
Returns a filtered list of astronauts based on the number of space walks they have been on.
Returns a filtered list of astronauts based on the number of hours during space walks they have been on.
